heros.name: Spiderman
heros.description: A young man bitten by a radioactive spider, Spider-Man gains superhuman abilities and uses them to protect New York City. His motto is 'With great power comes great responsibility.'

heros.name: Iron Man
heros.description: Genius billionaire Tony Stark builds a high-tech suit of armor to escape captivity and later uses it to protect the world. He embodies innovation and heroism.

heros.name: Thor
heros.description: The Norse God of Thunder, Thor wields the enchanted hammer Mj√∂lnir and possesses immense strength. He defends both Asgard and Earth from powerful threats.

heros.name: Captain America
heros.description: A super-soldier from World War II, Captain America fights for justice and freedom. With his iconic shield, he leads with honor and courage.

villans.name: Thanos
villans.description: A powerful cosmic warlord, Thanos seeks the Infinity Stones to gain ultimate power. His goal is to eliminate half of all life in the universe to bring balance.

villans.name: Norman Osborn
villans.description: The wealthy industrialist and father of Harry Osborn, Norman becomes the Green Goblin, a dangerous adversary to Spider-Man with a twisted agenda.

villans.name: Doctor Doom
villans.description: Victor Von Doom, the ruler of Latveria, is a brilliant inventor and sorcerer. He seeks power to reshape the world according to his vision, often clashing with the Fantastic Four.

villans.name: Red Skull
villans.description: The archenemy of Captain America, Red Skull is a Nazi officer who wields the Tesseract's power for his own malevolent goals, embodying pure evil.
